entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Markham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Buttonville Municipal Airport 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: NE 14 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Freezing drizzle or ice pellets early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
